channel.title: Game issue - Lambda core - wall in the way
channel.description:
Hi, I stuck in Lambda core. In one part, the game do not show the loading process and I can not walk into another sector, because wall is in my way.
The point is [url='https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=8guGzxX6FHw']in this video[/url] at 27:10.
In my game, I can't see crates behind the dead body (nor that body - it appears after loading), [url='https://images.akamai.steamusercontent.com/ugc/356148425661518203/1AD54DDFAF673A0ED7523818368F7904ACF7A9B5/']because of that wall[/url]. But guy in the video can continue without problem.
Can anybody provide more info, please?

item.title: Game issue - Lambda core - wall in the way
item.dc:creator: Agent6
item.description:
Could be an issue with the game though, rather than a level specific one.

Both in the game and mod releases I could sometimes pass the loading screen at completely random times/levels. Even in HL2 one time. The game would look like it’s loading and after it’s done, nothing actually happened.

Read full topic
item.source: Game issue - Lambda core - wall in the way

item.title: Game issue - Lambda core - wall in the way
item.dc:creator: JeffMOD
item.description:
Well, it looks like the loading zone (trigger_changelevel) isn’t working for some reason.
I can’t think of any reason why that particular one wouldn’t activate, since it’s not one of the triggered ones.

Did you maybe use noclip at some point, or some speedrunning tactic that causes you to get up higher than normal? Only thing I can think of that would cause it not to load is that you maybe bypassed it somehow.

Try walking back through the hall, and turn around and go back if it loads the next map at any point.

Read full topic
item.source: Game issue - Lambda core - wall in the way

item.title: Game issue - Lambda core - wall in the way
item.dc:creator: pilniczek
item.description:
Hi,
I stuck in Lambda core. In one part, the game do not show the loading process and I can not walk into another sector, because wall is in my way.

The point is in this video at 27:10.

In my game, I can’t see crates behind the dead body (nor that body - it appears after loading), because of that wall. But guy in the video can continue without problem.

Can anybody provide more info, please?
